name: Revv Aviation
about: Revv Aviation is a pioneering flight school and aviation services provider dedicated to bringing personal aviation to smaller towns across the Midwest. Founded in 2022, Revv is driven by a passion for aviation and a commitment to making flying accessible and affordable. With multiple locations, including Omaha, Nebraska, and Sioux City, Iowa, Revv offers comprehensive flight training from private pilot to airline transport pilot levels, all meeting FAA requirements. Our experienced instructors and advanced aeronautical technology ensure safe and proficient pilots. Revv also provides air charter services, aircraft rental, and other aviation needs, fostering a community of aviators and promoting the joy and wonder of flying for everyone. Our mission is to introduce personal aviation to more people, ensuring excellence in every aspect of our services.
